thought: The Gmail send message action is failing, likely because the required parameters are not set. We need to provide all required parameters properly, including sendTo, subject, emailType, and message.
plan: Set sendTo to the recipient email address 'qwuqwuqwu@gmail.com'.
Set subject to 'To Customer commercial flows reminder'.
Set message to the reminder content generated by AI.
Test the Gmail send action with these parameters.
